name: Google Search classic (underlines & smaller size)
description: Attempts to restore search results to their pre-March 2014 state, which is when Google made the text huge and removed the result title underlines.
additional_info: This this userstyle is mostly useless now, because 1-2 years after I made it, Google stopped highlighting matches within result titles (i.e. the entire title is now a single element). Without this match highlighting, I can only style the entire result title, rather than only bolding the match and leaving the rest non-bolded (like this screenshot from a 2014 version of this userstyle). Also, may not work during the initial pageload if you have Instant enabled and for some reason search from the home page.

discussions.name: Awesome style! Thanks too your great work and some tiny tweaking all is now prefect again.
